mapper.insert: insert into tbl_wish(pno, m_id, wno) values(#{pno}, #{m_id}, seq_wno.nextval)
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select w.wno, m.m_id, p.pno, p.p_img, p.p_info, p.p_price from tbl_wish w, tbl_product p, tbl_member m where m.m_id = w.m_id and w.pno = p.pno and m.m_id = #{m_id}) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select count(*) from tbl_wish where m_id = #{m_id}
